description.narrative: This activity ( Peace and Consolidation technical advice) is a component of Supporting peace and stability in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,363,803. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Participation in international peacekeeping operations. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 23-08-2016 and the end date is 30-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
